name: Suga's Drought
description:
Suga enters the afterlife, but it’s not what she expected. She doesn’t know who she is or understand her purpose during her time in the void. However, the all-knowing and guiding End will let her choose pieces of her memories to find who she is once again. 

Suga is determined to find answers traveling between the worst and best memories End has collected. The only options being to spectate, replay, or relive to continue. The choices she makes are hers alone…
